title: PIXEL 5 live streaming from front-camera always mirrored
content:
Live streaming on front-facing camera on a Pixel 5 always shows the mirror image such that all the text/image is reversed. 

Example: https://ibb.co/FkrQf6n

I understand this is to help users orient themselves and that for *SAVED* (not live) videos you can deselect "Save selfie as previewed" option. BUT, for LIVE streaming, it is always in reverse.  

Is there a way to change both the 1) previewed video and the 2) streamed video as NON mirrored? 

Thanks!
